translated: Elder’s Birth Stories🔽The Chapter about Worshipping the Bodhi Tree
The Elder who Worshipped the Bodhi Tree

original: pādapaṁ dharaṇīruhaṁ;🔽Ekaṁsaṁ añjaliṁ katvā,🔽avandiṁ pāṭaliṁ ahaṁ.🔽Añjaliṁ paggahetvāna,🔽garuṁ katvāna mānasaṁ;
analyzed: pādapam dharaṇīruha  ekasam añjalim katvā  avandim pāṭalim aha  añjalim paggahetvāna  garum katvāna mānasa
translated: a tree that grows on the earth,
I put my palms together in one place
Having raised my hands in respectful salutation,
having made my mind respectful,🔽I worshipped the pāṭali tree🔽as if face to face with the Fully Awakened One,
an ocean of compassion and knowledge.
I do not know of any bad destination,
this is the fruit of my worship.
the six supernormal knowledges have been realized,

original: kataṁ buddhassa sāsanaṁ”.🔽Itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā bodhivandako thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
analyzed: katam buddhassa sāsana  ittham sudam āyasmā bodhivandakaḥ theraḥ imāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsittha ati
translated: the Buddha’s instruction has been fulfilled.”🔽Thus the elder who worshipped the Bodhi tree recited these verses.
The Elder who Worshipped the Bodhi Tree’s Birth Story is the first.
